tag_list: rico-media, rico-media-inc-, statix-tv, spartx-com, spartx-inc-, cutter-mitchell, entrepreneur, serial-entrepreneur, online-networking, social-media, new-media, new-media-revolution
overview:
Co-Founder of the New Media company, Rico Media Inc. Experienced in marketing and communications development. Responsibilities within the company include managing and driving corporate operations, overseeing development of new products, and maintaining the company’s integrity.

Rico Media is a company that focuses on New Media applications. The company philosophy is out with the old and in with the new. Translated to operations, this is taken to heart in the focus Rico Media has on transforming old media into new, through the use of new technology.

degrees.degree_type: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
